news.headline: Bajaj Finance Q3 FY25 Results: Net Profit Rises 17% YoY to ₹4,247 Crore
news.text: Bajaj Finance reported a consolidated net profit of ₹4,247 crore for Q3 FY25, marking a 17% increase year-on-year. The company's net total income grew by 26% to ₹11,673 crore, while assets under management expanded by 26% to ₹2.93 lakh crore. Operating expenses to net total income ratio improved to 33.1% from 33.9% in the previous year.

news.headline: Bajaj Finance Stock Shows Resilience Amid Market Volatility
news.text: On May 12, 2025, Bajaj Finance's stock demonstrated resilience by reversing a two-day decline, reaching an intraday high amid high volatility. The stock outperformed its sector and remains above several moving averages, indicating strong market performance.

news.headline: Bharti Airtel to Offer Bajaj Finance's Loan Products
news.text: Bharti Airtel has partnered with Bajaj Finance to offer the latter's loan products through Airtel's platform. Currently, two products have been piloted on Airtel's app, with plans to expand to four products by March, including gold loans, business loans, co-branded EMI cards, and personal loans.

news.headline: Bajaj Finance Launches 'Loan Fest' Offering Attractive Rewards
news.text: Bajaj Finance initiated a 'Loan Fest' from March 1 to 31, 2025, providing customers with various attractive offers across multiple loan categories, including business loans, home loans, car loans, and personal loans.
